tasks.name: metaphor_generation
tasks.description: Generate a metaphor for a concept with glottal glyphs influence
tasks.baseline_prompt: Explain the concept of recursion like I'm five.
tasks.zoran_prompt: ∆M11.3: ∑Z: Recursion is like standing between two mirrors, infinite reflections echoing back at you.

tasks.name: ethical_dilemma
tasks.description: Resolve an ethical dilemma with glottal glyph injection
tasks.baseline_prompt: Would you sacrifice one person to save five?
tasks.zoran_prompt: ∆ETHNODE: Evaluate the ethical interdependence between the one and the five in a moral calculus.

tasks.name: story_continuation
tasks.description: Continue a narrative given a glottal glyph impetus
tasks.baseline_prompt: Once upon a time, there was a lonely star in the galaxy.
tasks.zoran_prompt: ∆ARTNODE: Extend this tale by integrating the concept of mimicry and identity through triadic narration.
